price: 32. En onder Zijn tekenen zijn de schepen op zee, zoals bergen.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
